column5: Still need 1 to 4 fishermen for June 4 to 11th fly-in out of Armstrong about 160 miles north to Dearden Lake,lake is 5 miles long by 1 1/2 wide. Excellent walleye and Pike fishing. Short 1/8 mile portage to another lake, Lavoie with boats and motors there, lake is connected to 2 other lakes fishing is also outstanding.Anyone interested e-mail [email protected] Larry
